name: Pacific Parkour League (PPL)
description:
Pacific Parkour League (PPL) is a first person parkour platformer game I've made as my entry for Ludum Dare 40. 

The theme: the more you have, the worse it is.

Complete EXTREME parkour levels with a CRAZY amount of momentum. The more momentum, the harder it is!

CONTROLS 

Move: W, A, S, D 

Look around: Mouse

Jump: Spacebar

Restart the level: R

Edit: There may be a few bugs in the game, if you find any please let me know and I'll work on a fix.
